attributes.action: Stop our democracy being stolen and the UK becoming like a Banana Republic.
attributes.background:
I have lost all confidence in our Politicians and Governments ability to make sound decisions.
For example by following a Brexit agenda that had criminality involved will our Politicians be guiltily of gross incompetence, misconduct, or worse could they be guilty of criminal activity themselves?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand your concerned about Brexit, but we're not sure what specific action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You could also sign and share one of the petitions about Brexit already on our site:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?q=eu&state=all
